abstract: Bank of America has said it will consider selling First Republic, which it acquired from Merrill Lynch.
snippet: Bank of America has said it will consider selling First Republic, which it acquired from Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: A group of private equity firms, including the Carlyle Group, the Blackstone Group and TPG, is considering making a bid for First Republic Bank, owned by Bank of America, people briefed on the matter said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Buyout Firms Said to Consider Bid for First Republic
headline.print_headline: Buyout Firms Said to Consider Bid for First Republic
